page.title: 09HAYMAKING
page.content: The{hay}in the fields we rent had been cut and baled so today, Saturday, we had to bring it home. I fed my pony and put her out to graze and then I fed my mum's goats as well as the ducks and chicks. After breakfast dad started the tractor and attached the trailer then we all climbed on to have a ride. We started stacking. The heat was scorching. My sister and I rolled the bales closer to the trailer while dad threw them up to mum at the top of the stack. We had sandwiches for lunch and in the afternoon it cooled down with a wind blowing. At 3.45pm. the work was finished. We all went indoors to rest and we hungrily munched the feast of goodies that mum had laid on the table. I'm glad we only make hay once a year!
